item.title: Laura add a quote by Ursula K. Le Guin
Laura add a quote by Ursula K. LeGuin
item.description: "The trouble is that we have a bad habit, encouraged by pendants and sophisticates, of considering happiness as something rather stupid. Only pain is intellectual, only evil interesting. This is the treason of the artist: a refusal to admit the banality of evil and the terrible boredom of pain." -- Ursula K. LeGuin
